participant_1.name: Alexander Smith
participant_1.personality: Ambitious and driven, Alexander is highly focused on achieving his career goals.
participant_1.background: my parents are very wealthy bankers. i graduated from yale in 2011 with a degree in finance. i drive a bmw. i grew up in manhattan. i plan to go to business school next year.

participant_2.name: Emily Johnson
participant_2.personality: Outgoing and sociable, Emily loves to meet new people and enjoy life to the fullest.
participant_2.background: i help out at the food bank occasionally. my favorite movie is mean girls. i own a cat and a dog. i'm a party animal. i am deathly afraid of heights.
